[vc_row cmt_bgimagefixed=”” break_in_responsive=”991″ full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1592464836832{padding-top: 84px !important;}” cmt_responsive_css=”31331108|colbreak_no|||||||||colbreak_no|||||45px||50px||colbreak_no||||||||||colbreak_no|||||||||”][vc_column reduce_extra_padding=”991″ css=”.vc_custom_1592464844078{padding-right: 40px !important;}”]

Answers to common perplexing questions.

Frequently Asked Questions ?

We are concerned about the cost of immigration services; you need to bear the cost of legal services, but it may vary. Through this page, we aim to answer some of the questions you may have regarding the selection of an attorney and the expected legal fees. Also, we hope to resolve your simple queries, which you may have before you begin with the immigration process.

[vc_tta_accordion color=”grey” gap=”25″ c_position=”right” active_section=””][vc_tta_section title=”What is an immigration consultant?” tab_id=”1590064618338-a5ae5de9-2d07″][vc_column_text]You will find several immigration consultants through their advertisements on various platforms. But before you choose a consultant to aid you with the immigration process, be assured that they are not licensed attorneys who can save you if a legal issue occurs. Hence, they are not authorized to provide legal advice in the procedure. The consultants are as expensive as attorneys, so hiring an attorney rather than a consultant is safe.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Do I need an immigration lawyer?” tab_id=”1590064618356-3be09857-c3fc”][vc_column_text]It is best to contact an immigration lawyer; to discuss your situation, and they will provide you with an approximate cost for you to have a lawyer who can assist you in every step and run the immigration process smoothly.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”If all the required information is available on the Internet, why would I still need an immigration attorney?” tab_id=”1590137727477-75d7d6fa-8464″][vc_column_text]You can’t rely on all the information available on the Internet, no matter how great a resource may be. Filing your own petition relying on Internet information can cause serious trouble to you. A poorly submitted petition can delay or damage your possibility of obtaining immigration. You need authentic and original documentation for your immigration process from a licensed attorney.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What aspects determine the fee an immigration attorney will charge?” tab_id=”1590064813087-2b49bf06-84ed”][vc_column_text]The fee of an immigration attorney may vary from case to case; for instance, the more complex the case, the fee will be higher because of the complexity of the case, and the attorney will have to work extensively on the case. Another factor is the attorney’s experience and status, an attorney with ten years of experience, will charge more than one with two years experience.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Does Fernbex provide visa?” tab_id=”1590064850215-15491617-56af”][vc_column_text]No, Fernbex does not provide visa; however,  we provide services to make the process possible for whoever approaches us. We are there to assist you with all the documentation required for immigration.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]
